devdoc.details: This contract lives on the L2 and receives messages from the L1 to register and unregister NFTs on the L1 chain. This is not an upgradeable contract and should not be used with a proxy.

constructor.details: After deployment you must call setFxRootTunnel() with the RootRegistrar Address on the L1.

params._addressManager: - This is the address manager on the protocol
params._fxChild: - This is the contract deployed on the L2 that will be sending messages here. This is a well known deployed contract that Matic has set up.

addressManager.details: local reference to the address manager contract
